//

//   -------------------- ----- ----

//   TemporalAAParameters c235     1
//   MeshOrigin           c236     1
//   MeshExtension        c237     1
//

    vs_3_0
    def c4, 3, 1, 0, 0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_blendindices v1
    dcl_color v2
    dcl_color o0
    dcl_texcoord o1
    dcl_texcoord4 o2
    dcl_position o3

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s3

    mov o0, v2
    mov o1, c4.z
    mul r0.x, c4.x, v1.x
    mova a0.x, r0.x
    mov r0.xyz, c237
    mad r0.xyz, v0, r0, c236
    mov r0.w, c4.y
    dp4 r1.x, r0, c7[a0.x]
    mul r1, r1.x, c232
    dp4 r2.x, r0, c6[a0.x]
    dp4 r0.x, r0, c8[a0.x]
    mad r1, c231, r2.x, r1
    mad r0, c233, r0.x, r1
    add r0, r0, c234
    mul r1, r0.y, c1
    mad r1, c0, r0.x, r1
    mad r1, c2, r0.z, r1
    mad r0, c3, r0.w, r1
    mul r1.x, r0.w, c235.z
    mad r0.xy, r1.x, c235, r0

mov o3, r0 // Relocated from line 56 with shadertool.py

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-vertex-halo --only-autofixed --stereo-sampler-vs=s3 D7E6B15C.txt
texldl r31, c220.z, s3
add r31.w, r0.w, -r31.y
mad r0.x, r31.w, r31.x, r0.x

    mov o2, r0

//     mov o3, r0 // Relocated to line 55 with shadertool.py

// approximately 22 instruction slots used
